title: Bowl And Stand, ca. 1825–30
provenance: Tower House Antiques, Bangor, Ireland; 1965 P. Warren, NY
description: Large shallow circular bowl with scalloped edge, rim cut with fans, sides with undulating strawberry diamond pattern; bas has waisted stem cut with prismatic rings; a band of strawberry diamonds above and a wide domed spreading foot with strawberry diamonds

tombstone.epitaph:
Bowl And Stand, ca. 1825–30.
ca. 1825–30. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-165-a,b.
